description:
Our Stratagem Law Group PLLC team is most well-known for its work in health law in Seattle, Washington. We bring years of real-world experience in health and adjacent subject matters to provide legal advice to our clients. While we are a new law firm, we are neither new to law nor health care. We have spent years building experience to better serve our clients.

Our Practice Areas

We have expanded our services beyond just health law. These are the main types of cases handled by our law firm:

• Corporate compliance education and program development
• Health and administrative law
• Nonprofit representation
• Civil and human rights
• Business transactions
• Corporate law

Why Choose Stratagem Law Group PLLC?

Our attorney, Matthew Macklin, is active in the health care industry. He is a licensed nursing home administrator and holds an MBA in health care management. Mr. Macklin also holds a governor-appointed position as a member of the Board of Nursing Home Administrators. This gives him a unique perspective on the challenges faced by medical facilities and health care professionals.

When advising our clients in the greater Seattle area, we leave no stone unturned in our search for solutions to even the most complex cases. While we cannot guarantee positive outcomes for every case we handle, we pursue every feasible option available to us.
